title: The Medieval Islamic Civilization - C. 8 (Thought, Philosophy 2
description:
The Medieval Islamic Civilization - Collection 8 (Thought, Philosophy 2):

We have 32 titles here:

-  Adamson & Taylor (Eds.) - The Cambridge Companion to Arabic Philosophy (2005)

-  Akasoy & Giglioni (Eds.) - Renaissance Averroism and Its Aftermath; Arabic Philosophy in Early Modern Europe (2013)

-  Akasoy & Raven (Eds.) - Islamic Thought in the Middle Ages; Studies in Text, Transmission and Translation, .. (2008)

-  Arberry - Avicenna on Theology (1951)

-  Chittick - The Heart of Islamic Philosophy; the Quest for Self-Knowledge in the Teachings of Afdal al-Din Kashani (2001)

-  Cook et al (Eds.) - Law and Tradition in Classical Islamic Thought; Studies in Honor of Professor Hossein Modarressi (2013)

-  Daftary & Meri (Eds.) - Culture and Memory in Medieval Islam; Essays in Honour of Wilfred Madelung (2003)

-  Fakhry - Islamic Philosophy; a Beginner's Guide (1997)

-  Frank - Al-Ghazali and the As'arite School (1994)

-  Groff & Leaman - Islamic Philosophy A-Z (2007)

-  Hallaq - A History of Islamic Legal Theories; an Introduction to Sunni Usul-Fiqh (1997)

-  Hallaq - An Introduction to Islamic Law (2009)

-  Hallaq - The Origins and Evolution of Islamic Law (2005)

-  Jackson - What Is Islamic Philosophy (2014)

-  Jaffer - Razi; Master of Qur'ainc Interpretation and Theological Reasoning (2015)

-  Kaukua - Self-Awareness in Islamic Philosophy; Avicenna and Beyond (2015)

-  Khalidi - Arabic Historical Thought in the Classical Period (1994)

-  Khalidi (Ed.) - Medieval Islamic Philosophical Writings (2005)

-  Lawson (Ed.) - Reason and Inspiration in Islam; Theology, Philosophy and Mysticism in Muslim Thought (2005)

-  Meserve - Empires of Islam in Renaissance Historical Thought (2008)

-  Michon - Introduction to Traditional Islam; Foundations, Art, and Spirituality (2008)

-  Mitha - Al-Ghazali and the Ismailis; a Debate on Reason and Authority in Medieval Islam (2001)

-  Nursi - The Letter; Epistles on Islamic Thought, Belief and Life (2007)

-  Picken - Spiritual Purification in Islam; the Life and Works of al-Muhasibi (2011)

-  Powers - Intent in Islamic Law; Motive and Meaning in Medieval Sunni Fiqh (2006)

-  Rosenthal - Political Thought in Medieval Islam; an Introductory Outline (1962)

-  Silvers - A Soaring Minaret; Abu Bakr al-Wasiti and the Rise of Baghdadi Sufism (2010)

-  Tymieniecka & Muhtaroglu (Eds.) - Classic Issues in Islamic Philosophy and Theology Today (2010)
Tymieniecka (Ed.) - Reason, Spirit and the Sacral in the New Enlightenment; Islamic Metaphysics Revived and Recent Phenomenology of Life (2011)

-  Tymieniecka et al (Eds.) - Islamic Philosophy and Occidental Phenomenology in Dialogue; the Logos of Life and Cultural Interlacing (2014)

-  Vryonis (Ed.) - Islam and Cultural Change in the Middle Ages (1975)

-  Walbridge - God and Logic in Islam; the Caliphate of Reason (2011)
